reviewText: My children like watching this with their baby brother, but we have difficult understanding the signs as they're demonstrated by puppets with fewer than five fingers on each hand!
My sons watch a dvd before bathtime every night.  We keep the other dvd's in the vehicle for short and long drives.

Everyone of these DVDs are WONDERFUL!  Full of interaction, repitition, real babies, 3D babies and so much more.  My children easily picked up signs from these DVD's.  It is a great way for them to be able to watch television and come away with something they have learned in such a short time!  I would recommend these as a babies first introduction to television.  WONDERFUL!
